superseding_details.component_description: Approved new door position to change. Wardrobes in existing Bedrooms to stay in the same position (no En-suite created).

phasing_details.phase_detail: Laundry conversion including new door opening. Dates are aproximate.

description: Change of use from commercial laundry room to habitable space/bedroom
decision_conditions: The development hereby permitted shall begin before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.Reason: This is required by Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

The development hereby approved shall remain as ancillary/incidental accommodation to the flat currently known as: 'Flat 3, Milton House, Kingsnympton Park, Kingston Upon Thames, KT2 7TL' and shall not be used for any other purpose.Reason: To protect the amenities of neighbouring properties and to ensure that the approved development is not used as a separate unit of accommodation, in accordance with Policy DM10 of the Kingston Core Strategy (2012).
